main event: A large irregular object with over 100 lights was reported hovering very low, which was later identified as a PA-12 aircraft advertising a motel opening.
interesting points: The object was reported to have the ability to hover and descend rapidly., The sighting was confirmed by ground and air visual observations., Weather conditions were clear and windless at the time of the sighting., There were reports of the object splitting into two and then merging back into one., An investigation by the Air Force evaluated the sighting and concluded it was an aircraft.
witness description: 1st Lt Douglas Kapson and a police officer
